Name: Absorb
Description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down.

Name: Acid
Description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Acid Armor
Description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

Name: Aerial Ace
Description: This move does not check accuracy.

Name: Aeroblast
Description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Agility
Description: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

Name: Air Cutter
Description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Amnesia
Description: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.

Name: Ancient Power
Description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Arm Thrust
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Aromatherapy
Description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition.

Name: Assist
Description: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Thief, or Trick.

Name: Astonish
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles if the target has used Minimize while active.

Name: Attract
Description: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability are immune.

Name: Aurora Beam
Description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Barrage
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Barrier
Description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

Name: Baton Pass
Description: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.

Name: Beat Up
Description: Deals typeless damage. Hits one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party, or fails if no Pokemon meet the criteria. For each hit, the damage formula uses the participating Pokemon's base Attack as the Attack stat, the target's base Defense as the Defense stat, and ignores stat stages and other effects that modify Attack or Defense; each hit is considered to come from the user.

Name: Belly Drum
Description: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.

Name: Bide
Description: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not ignore type immunity.

Name: Bind
Description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

Name: Bite
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Blast Burn
Description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

Name: Blaze Kick
Description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Blizzard
Description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Name: Block
Description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

Name: Body Slam
Description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Bone Club
Description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Bone Rush
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Bonemerang
Description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

Name: Bounce
Description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Sky Uppercut, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it.

Name: Brick Break
Description: If this attack does not miss and whether or not the target is immune, the effects of Reflect and Light Screen end for the opponent's side of the field before damage is calculated.

Name: Bubble
Description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Bubble Beam
Description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Bulk Up
Description: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Bullet Seed
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Calm Mind
Description: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Camouflage
Description: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain. Fails if the type is one of the user's current types.

Name: Charge
Description: If the user uses an Electric-type attack on the next turn, its power will be doubled.

Name: Charm
Description: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

Name: Clamp
Description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

Name: Comet Punch
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Confuse Ray
Description: Causes the target to become confused.

Name: Confusion
Description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

Name: Constrict
Description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Conversion
Description: The user's type changes to match the original type of one of its known moves besides Curse, at random, but not either of its current types. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.

Name: Conversion 2
Description: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used against the user, if it was successful against the user, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type, but considers Struggle as Normal. Fails if the last move used against the user was not successful, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.

Name: Cosmic Power
Description: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Cotton Spore
Description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

Name: Counter
Description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. This move considers Hidden Power as Normal type, and only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Covet
Description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Enigma Berry. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle.

Name: Crabhammer
Description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Cross Chop
Description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Crunch
Description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Crush Claw
Description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Curse
Description: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected or has a substitute.

Name: Cut
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Defense Curl
Description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable).

Name: Destiny Bond
Description: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight.

Name: Detect
Description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has an X/65536 chance of being successful, where X starts at 65535 and halves, rounded down, each time this move is successfully used. After the fourth successful use in a row, X drops to 118 and continues with seemingly random values from 0-65535 on subsequent successful uses. X resets to 65535 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

Name: Dig
Description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude, which have doubled power when used against it, and is also unaffected by weather.

Name: Disable
Description: For 2 to 5 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move has 0 PP.

Name: Dive
Description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool, which have doubled power when used against it, and is also unaffected by weather.

Name: Dizzy Punch
Description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Name: Doom Desire
Description: Deals typeless damage that cannot be a critical hit two turns after this move is used. Damage is calculated against the target on use, and at the end of the final turn that damage is dealt to the Pokemon at the position the original target had at the time. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.

Name: Double Kick
Description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

Name: Double Slap
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Double Team
Description: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.

Name: Double-Edge
Description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

Name: Dragon Breath
Description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Dragon Claw
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Dragon Dance
Description: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Dragon Rage
Description: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.

Name: Dream Eater
Description: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep and does not have a substitute. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

Name: Drill Peck
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Dynamic Punch
Description: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

Name: Earthquake
Description: Power doubles if the target is using Dig.

Name: Egg Bomb
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Ember
Description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Name: Encore
Description: For 3 to 6 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Encore, Mimic, Mirror Move, Sketch, Struggle, or Transform.

Name: Endeavor
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.

Name: Endure
Description: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has an X/65536 chance of being successful, where X starts at 65535 and halves, rounded down, each time this move is successfully used. After the fourth successful use in a row, X drops to 118 and continues with seemingly random values from 0-65535 on subsequent successful uses. X resets to 65535 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

Name: Eruption
Description: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.

Name: Explosion
Description: The user faints after using this move. The target's Defense is halved during damage calculation. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.

Name: Extrasensory
Description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles if the target has used Minimize while active.

Name: Extreme Speed
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Facade
Description: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

Name: Fake Out
Description: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.

Name: Fake Tears
Description: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.

Name: False Swipe
Description: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

Name: Feather Dance
Description: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

Name: Feint Attack
Description: This move does not check accuracy.

Name: Fire Blast
Description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Name: Fire Punch
Description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Name: Fire Spin
Description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

Name: Fissure
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.

Name: Flail
Description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.

Name: Flame Wheel
Description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Name: Flamethrower
Description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Name: Flash
Description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Name: Flatter
Description: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.

Name: Fly
Description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Sky Uppercut, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it.

Name: Focus Energy
Description: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.

Name: Focus Punch
Description: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move, but it still loses PP.

Name: Follow Me
Description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod Ability. This effect remains active even if the user leaves the field. Fails if it is not a Double Battle.

Name: Foresight
Description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type.

Name: Frenzy Plant
Description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

Name: Frustration
Description: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

Name: Fury Attack
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Fury Cutter
Description: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.

Name: Fury Swipes
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Future Sight
Description: Deals typeless damage that cannot be a critical hit two turns after this move is used. Damage is calculated against the target on use, and at the end of the final turn that damage is dealt to the Pokemon at the position the original target had at the time. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.

Name: Giga Drain
Description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down.

Name: Glare
Description: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

Name: Grass Whistle
Description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Name: Growl
Description: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Growth
Description: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Grudge
Description: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.

Name: Guillotine
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.

Name: Gust
Description: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce or Fly.

Name: Hail
Description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type. Fails if the current weather is Hail.

Name: Harden
Description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Haze
Description: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

Name: Headbutt
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Heal Bell
Description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured.

Name: Heat Wave
Description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Name: Helping Hand
Description: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.

Name: Hidden Power
Description: This move's type and power depend on the user's individual values (IVs). Power varies between 30 and 70, and type can be any but Normal.

Name: High Jump Kick
Description: If this attack is not successful and the target was not immune, the user loses HP equal to half of the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but no less than 1 HP and no more than half of the target's maximum HP, as crash damage.

Name: Horn Attack
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Horn Drill
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.

Name: Howl
Description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Hydro Cannon
Description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

Name: Hydro Pump
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Hyper Beam
Description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

Name: Hyper Fang
Description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Hyper Voice
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Hypnosis
Description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Name: Ice Ball
Description: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.

Name: Ice Beam
Description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Name: Ice Punch
Description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Name: Icicle Spear
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Icy Wind
Description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Imprison
Description: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active. Fails if no opposing Pokemon know any of the user's moves.

Name: Ingrain
Description: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, and the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect.

Name: Iron Defense
Description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

Name: Iron Tail
Description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Jump Kick
Description: If this attack is not successful and the target was not immune, the user loses HP equal to half of the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but no less than 1 HP and no more than half of the target's maximum HP, as crash damage.

Name: Karate Chop
Description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Kinesis
Description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Name: Knock Off
Description: The target's held item is lost for the rest of the battle, unless it has the Sticky Hold Ability. During the effect, the target cannot gain a new item by any means.

Name: Leaf Blade
Description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Leech Life
Description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down.

Name: Leech Seed
Description: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Rapid Spin, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.

Name: Leer
Description: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Lick
Description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Light Screen
Description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 1/2 damage from special attacks, or 2/3 damage if there are multiple active Pokemon on the user's side. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.

Name: Lock-On
Description: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. When this effect is started against the target, this and Mind Reader's effects end for every other Pokemon against that target. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement remains under this effect. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, this effect is restarted against the same target for the replacement. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.

Name: Lovely Kiss
Description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Name: Low Kick
Description: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.

Name: Luster Purge
Description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Mach Punch
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Magic Coat
Description: The user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. If the move targets both opposing Pokemon and the Pokemon under this effect is on the left side, it will reflect the move targeting both opposing Pokemon and its ally will not be affected by the original move; otherwise, if the Pokemon under this effect is on the right side, its ally will be affected by the original move and this Pokemon will reflect the move only targeting the original user. The effect ends once a move is reflected or at the end of the turn. Moves reflected in this way can be reflected again by another Pokemon under this effect. If the user has the Soundproof Ability, it nullifies sound-based moves before this effect happens. The Lightning Rod Ability redirects Electric moves before this move takes effect.

Name: Magical Leaf
Description: This move does not check accuracy.

Name: Magnitude
Description: The power of this move varies. 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Power doubles if the target is using Dig.

Name: Mean Look
Description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

Name: Meditate
Description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Mega Drain
Description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down.

Name: Mega Kick
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Mega Punch
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Megahorn
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Memento
Description: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints. This move does not check accuracy, and can hit targets in the middle of a two-turn move. Fails entirely if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages are both -6.

Name: Metal Claw
Description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Metal Sound
Description: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.

Name: Meteor Mash
Description: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Metronome
Description: A random move is selected for use, other than Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Thief, or Trick.

Name: Milk Drink
Description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

Name: Mimic
Description: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has 5 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Metronome, Mimic, Sketch, or Struggle.

Name: Mind Reader
Description: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. When this effect is started against the target, this and Lock-On's effects end for every other Pokemon against that target. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement remains under this effect. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, this effect is restarted against the same target for the replacement. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.

Name: Minimize
Description: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Astonish, Extrasensory, Needle Arm, and Stomp will have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.

Name: Mirror Coat
Description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. This move considers Hidden Power as Normal type, and only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.

Name: Mirror Move
Description: The user uses the last move that successfully targeted the user. The copied move is used with no specific target. Fails if no move has targeted the user, if the move missed, failed, or had no effect on the user, or if the move cannot be copied by this move.

Name: Mist
Description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.

Name: Mist Ball
Description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Moonlight
Description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

Name: Morning Sun
Description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

Name: Mud Shot
Description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Mud Sport
Description: While the user is active, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power halved. Fails if this effect is already active for the user. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.

Name: Mud-Slap
Description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Name: Muddy Water
Description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Name: Nature Power
Description: This move calls another move for use depending on the battle terrain. Swift in Wi-Fi battles.

Name: Needle Arm
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles if the target has used Minimize while active.

Name: Night Shade
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.

Name: Nightmare
Description: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.

Name: Octazooka
Description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Name: Odor Sleuth
Description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type.

Name: Outrage
Description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, falls asleep, becomes frozen, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

Name: Overheat
Description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

Name: Pain Split
Description: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.

Name: Pay Day
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Peck
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Perish Song
Description: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.

Name: Petal Dance
Description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, falls asleep, becomes frozen, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

Name: Pin Missile
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Poison Fang
Description: Has a 30% chance to badly poison the target.

Name: Poison Gas
Description: Poisons the target.

Name: Poison Powder
Description: Poisons the target.

Name: Poison Sting
Description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Name: Poison Tail
Description: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Pound
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Powder Snow
Description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Name: Present
Description: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

Name: Protect
Description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has an X/65536 chance of being successful, where X starts at 65535 and halves, rounded down, each time this move is successfully used. After the fourth successful use in a row, X drops to 118 and continues with seemingly random values from 0-65535 on subsequent successful uses. X resets to 65535 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

Name: Psybeam
Description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

Name: Psych Up
Description: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.

Name: Psychic
Description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Psycho Boost
Description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

Name: Psywave
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X * 10 + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 10, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

Name: Pursuit
Description: If the target is an opposing Pokemon and it switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon becomes active immediately.

Name: Quick Attack
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Rage
Description: Once this move is used and unless the target protected itself, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.

Name: Rain Dance
Description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.

Name: Rapid Spin
Description: If this move is successful, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and Spikes are removed from the user's side of the field.

Name: Razor Leaf
Description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Razor Wind
Description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second.

Name: Recover
Description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

Name: Recycle
Description: The user regains the item last used by a Pokemon in its current position on the field, even if that Pokemon was not the user. Fails if the user is holding an item, if no items have been used at the user's position, or if the item was lost to Covet, Knock Off, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.

Name: Reflect
Description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 1/2 damage from physical attacks, or 2/3 damage if there are multiple active Pokemon on the user's side. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.

Name: Refresh
Description: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

Name: Rest
Description: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.

Name: Return
Description: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

Name: Revenge
Description: Damage doubles if the user was hit by a Pokemon in the target's current position this turn, and that Pokemon was the last to hit the user.

Name: Reversal
Description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.

Name: Roar
Description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability, or if the user's level is lower than the target's and X * (user's level + target's level) / 256 + 1 is less than or equal to (target's level / 4), rounded down, where X is a random number from 0 to 255.

Name: Rock Blast
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Rock Slide
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Rock Smash
Description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Rock Throw
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Rock Tomb
Description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Role Play
Description: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the target's Ability is Wonder Guard.

Name: Rolling Kick
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Rollout
Description: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.

Name: Sacred Fire
Description: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.

Name: Safeguard
Description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.

Name: Sand Attack
Description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Name: Sand Tomb
Description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

Name: Sandstorm
Description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Sand Veil Ability. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.

Name: Scary Face
Description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

Name: Scratch
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Screech
Description: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

Name: Secret Power
Description: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain.

Name: Seismic Toss
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.

Name: Self-Destruct
Description: The user faints after using this move. The target's Defense is halved during damage calculation. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.

Name: Shadow Ball
Description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Shadow Punch
Description: This move does not check accuracy.

Name: Sharpen
Description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Sheer Cold
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.

Name: Shock Wave
Description: This move does not check accuracy.

Name: Signal Beam
Description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

Name: Silver Wind
Description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Sing
Description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Name: Sketch
Description: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows.

Name: Skill Swap
Description: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is Wonder Guard.

Name: Skull Bash
Description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn.

Name: Sky Attack
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second.

Name: Sky Uppercut
Description: This move can hit a target using Bounce or Fly.

Name: Slack Off
Description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

Name: Slam
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Slash
Description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Name: Sleep Powder
Description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Name: Sleep Talk
Description: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, but if it currently has 0 PP it will fail to be used. This move cannot select Assist, Bide, Focus Punch, Metronome, Mirror Move, Sleep Talk, Uproar, or any two-turn move.

Name: Sludge
Description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Name: Sludge Bomb
Description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Name: Smelling Salts
Description: Damage doubles if the target is paralyzed. If this move is successful, the target is cured of paralysis.

Name: Smog
Description: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.

Name: Smokescreen
Description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Name: Snatch
Description: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use this move this turn, the applicable moves are stolen by each of those Pokemon in turn order, and only the last user in turn order will gain the effects.

Name: Snore
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the user is not asleep.

Name: Soft-Boiled
Description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

Name: Solar Beam
Description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Damage is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.

Name: Sonic Boom
Description: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.

Name: Spark
Description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Spider Web
Description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

Name: Spike Cannon
Description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Spikes
Description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin successfully.

Name: Spit Up
Description: Damage is multiplied by the user's Stockpile count. This move does not apply damage variance and cannot be a critical hit. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Unless this move misses, the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.

Name: Spite
Description: Causes the target's last move used to lose 2 to 5 PP, at random. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 or 1 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.

Name: Splash
Description: No competitive use.

Name: Spore
Description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Name: Steel Wing
Description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Stockpile
Description: The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3. The user's Stockpile count is reset to 0 when it is no longer active.

Name: Stomp
Description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles if the target has used Minimize while active.

Name: Strength
Description: No additional effect.

Name: String Shot
Description: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Name: Struggle
Description: Deals typeless damage to a random opposing Pokemon. If this move was successful, the user takes damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP, and the Rock Head Ability does not prevent this. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.

Name: Stun Spore
Description: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

Name: Submission
Description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

Name: Substitute
Description: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.

Name: Sunny Day
Description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.

Name: Super Fang
Description: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

Name: Superpower
Description: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Supersonic
Description: Causes the target to become confused.

Name: Surf
Description: Power doubles if the target is using Dive.

Name: Swagger
Description: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.

Name: Swallow
Description: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Stockpile count resets to 0.

Name: Sweet Kiss
Description: Causes the target to become confused.

Name: Sweet Scent
Description: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage.

Name: Swift
Description: This move does not check accuracy.

Name: Swords Dance
Description: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

Name: Synthesis
Description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

Name: Tackle
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Tail Glow
Description: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

Name: Tail Whip
Description: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Take Down
Description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

Name: Taunt
Description: For 2 turns, prevents the target from using non-damaging moves.

Name: Teeter Dance
Description: Causes the target to become confused.

Name: Teleport
Description: Fails when used.

Name: Thief
Description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Enigma Berry. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle.

Name: Thrash
Description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, falls asleep, becomes frozen, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

Name: Thunder
Description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce or Fly. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.

Name: Thunder Punch
Description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Thunder Shock
Description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Thunder Wave
Description: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

Name: Thunderbolt
Description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Tickle
Description: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Torment
Description: Prevents the target from selecting the same move for use two turns in a row. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.

Name: Toxic
Description: Badly poisons the target.

Name: Transform
Description: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, IVs, species, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP. This move fails if the target has transformed.

Name: Tri Attack
Description: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

Name: Trick
Description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail, if neither is holding an item, if either is under the effect of Knock Off, or if the target has the Sticky Hold Ability.

Name: Triple Kick
Description: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

Name: Twineedle
Description: Hits twice, with each hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

Name: Twister
Description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Power doubles if the target is using Bounce or Fly.

Name: Uproar
Description: The user spends two to five turns locked into this move. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. During effect, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means, and Pokemon that are already asleep wake up as their turn starts or at the end of each turn, including the last one. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.

Name: Vice Grip
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Vine Whip
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Vital Throw
Description: This move does not check accuracy.

Name: Volt Tackle
Description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

Name: Water Gun
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Water Pulse
Description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Name: Water Sport
Description: While the user is active, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power halved. Fails if this effect is already active for the user. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.

Name: Water Spout
Description: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.

Name: Waterfall
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Weather Ball
Description: Damage doubles if a weather condition is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Hail, Water type during Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Sunny Day.

Name: Whirlpool
Description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability, or if the user's level is lower than the target's and X * (user's level + target's level) / 256 + 1 is less than or equal to (target's level / 4), rounded down, where X is a random number from 0 to 255.

Name: Will-O-Wisp
Description: Burns the target.

Name: Wing Attack
Description: No additional effect.

Name: Wish
Description: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of its maximum HP restored to it, rounded down. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.

Name: Withdraw
Description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

Name: Wrap
Description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

Name: Yawn
Description: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a non-volatile status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a non-volatile status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.

Name: Zap Cannon
Description: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
